title: Is this real or is this phishing
body: I just received a e-mail I believe to be riots support team (

replies.body: I'm glad that article was able to help!  If you have a ticket number, I'd be happy to confirm as well!
I just found this and answered my own question. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751784-Emails-from-Riot-Games
